name: Beast (itch) (Muximus)
description:
Beast is a game about surviving a never ending onslaught as a Werewolf on the run. In your Werewolf form, you are an uncontrollable juggernaught, killing all enemies in your way. Unfortunately, enemies carry weapons to stop the Werewolf in its tracks, so you must protect yourself by morphing into your human form to take control and survive.

CONTROLS:

Shift into the Beast: Let go of all inputs to give the beast control.

Shift into Human form: Moving transforms you into Human form.

Move: WASD

Start/Restart: Space Bar

Pause: Esc
